wikitext.*:
作品名：My favorite food

作者：潮田渚（Shiota Nagisa）

<poem>

Yesterday, I went to a Sushi Shop with my family to cereblate the birthday of my father. Sushi is the most favourite food of my father, and of course me! There is a lot of the Sushi Shop. My father's favourite ingredient is octopus. Its taste and texture is so wonderful that I of course ordered it yesterday. And when I ate it, my teacher appeared in my mind because his tentacle looks like the Octopus. I wonder the taste of my teacher's tentacle……

</poem>
